phrases: You fought quite well, considering your wounds.
They must have realized it the moment they set eyes on each other.
That this destiny had awaited them since long before they had even met.
They were not like mere ships passing in the night.
They understood each other better than anyone else,
and each was focused solely on the other.
This is the Criminal Investigation Department, part of the Public Safety Bureau.
Access to this block is currently restricted to ensure safety.
All residents of this neighborhood are expected to evacuate immediately.
This is the Criminal Investigation Department, part of the Public Safety Bureau.
Access to this block is currently restricted to ensure safety.
All residents of this neighborhood are expected to evacuate immediately.
You have got rotten luck, having to deal with an incident right after getting posted.
I have been assigned to the CID as of today.
Sorry, but the CID is very short on manpower.
So you will have to hit the ground running.
A street scanner flagged him while doing a Hue Check,
so a Security Drone ordered him to receive therapy,
The Psycho-Pass it recorded for him was forest green.
His aggression and compulsion are expected to be high.
Why would he avoid treatment long enough for his Hue to get this cloudy?
It is also possible that he used incompatible drugs.
In any case, he is a latent criminal; one far enough gone that we do not need to wait for Sibyl Judgement.
The problem is that the place Okura ran to...
Since this is an abolition block, there is no relay device, so Drones cannot come in.
I heard Okura abducted a passerby and is holding her hostage.
According to a witness, it is a young woman.
We have not been able to confirm her identity yet.
Records state this is an uninhabited block,
but because of that, it is become a den of homeless people.
Do not think that the guys you are about to meet are human like us.
Their Psycho-Pass Crime Coefficients all exceed a specific value.
They are people of bankrupt character.
Normally, they would be completely isolated as latent criminals.
However, they are allowed into the outside world for the sole purpose
of flushing out criminals just like themselves.
They are beasts used to hunt beasts.
They are what we call Enforcers.
Is that cutie the newbie that everyone is been talking about, Gino?
Starting today, she is your second owner.
You guys all looked through the target's data, right?
We are going to tighten the noose around our cornered rat.
We will divide into two groups and take turns.
Kunizuka and Kagari, come with me.
I want to go with the cutie!
It was not funny, that is why.
You could order us to stand by.
We would not have any problems with that.
You oughta earn your paycheck, pops.
Hey, do not look so nervous, young lady.
You know how to use a Dominator, right?
I-I did receive training on it, more or less...
This is a gun that reads the Psycho-Pass of the target you are aiming at.
Its safety is released only when the target is a latent criminal.
You can just do what the Dominator tells you.
If it says shoot, just shoot.
If it is set to basic mode, it will use Paralyzer.
It will only paralyze the target, so we will take them into custody and that will be that.
Well, you do not have to take it too seriously.
Dominator Portable Psychological Diagnosis and Suppression System
Affiliation: Public Safety Bureau, Criminal Investigation Department.
The current enforcement mode is Non-Lethal Paralyzer.
It is a directional voice, so only the holder of the gun can hear it.
Aim calmly and disable the target.
It might be annoying at first, but you will get used to it soon.
Are not we going to have a meeting and come up with a plan?
We will hunt the prey and you will observe.
That is all there is to it.
Um, could you go into a bit more detail?
What he is saying is, leave it to us.
We might not look like it, but we are experts.
We have our own way of doing things.
But the one who is responsible for our actions is you, the Inspector.
So if you have a problem with the way I do things,
use that gun to shoot me.
We are latent criminals too, just like the target.
The Dominator will work on us as well.
Oh, we have not introduced ourselves yet.
That stubborn fool is Kougami Shinya.
Looking forward to working with you, young lady.
Up until today, I did everything by the book.
I spent my whole life walking on eggshells,
trying my hardest not to upset or bother anyone.
And yet, I get flagged by one little detector and boom!
They already treat me like I am a criminal.
Now that it is come to this, it is all over.
I will never be able to get a job, get married, or anything else.
I have restrained myself all this time.
So now, I will just do whatever I want.
I will take whatever I want.
I will kill anyone I do not like!
to have sex with a pretty woman like you.
With a real, flesh-and-blood woman, not a virtual one.
Not a target for enforcement action.
An Enforcer registered at the Criminal Investigation Department.
This target has Enforce At Will status.
So he really is a latent criminal...
And yet, he seemed pretty normal.
I have heard rumors about you.
They say you were the top student at the academy.
I will give you some friendly advice.
Just forget everything you learned there.
None of that stuff is any use when you are actually working on a case.
Our work's full of things that defy all logic.
People's thoughts, wishes, hopes and desires...
We live in a time where technology can read everything in your mind,
and yet, the world teems with people who hate, lie, steal, and try to harm others.
If that is not irrational, then what is it?
Everything you have been taught is based on theories and logic.
Soon, you will likely come to realize how pointless they are.
I found the target on the fourth floor of the KT Building.
Stay there and keep an eye on him.
Hound 2 and I will box him in.
But considering how worked up he is,
the girl he took as a hostage may be at the end of her rope.
Should I go in by myself and secure him?
He is a target for enforcement action.
He is on stimulants or something!
The target's Threat Judgement has been updated.
An Oracle by the Sibyl System.
It says that Okura Nobuo is no longer someone who is needed in this world.
All this because he was detected by a street scanner?
He probably drove himself into a corner.
Nothing, not even therapy, will work on him anymore.
The judgment on him is that there is no room for rehabilitation.
It is unfortunate that your first case had to be such an unpleasant one, young lady.
My Psycho-Pass has become so cloudy that it looks like mud.
What is more, your Psycho-Pass looks just like mine now.
If they catch you, it will be all over for you too.
You will be tortured by them as a latent criminal for the rest of your life.
We would better resolve this quickly or it will be all over for the hostage.
A Crime Coefficient can be contagious.
Young people these days are not good at dealing with stress,
so they are easily affected by violent urges and compulsions.
I wrote a thesis on that topic.
Let me tell you one thing, young lady.
It could happen to any of us.
The reason we were made Enforcers in the first place is...
Using an old man and a newbie as a decoy, eh?
You sure got cojones, do not you, Ko?
We are with the Public Safety Bureau.
She is a target for enforcement action.
Well, I guess we have no choice.
That is exactly why the Paralyzer exists!
We will put her to sleep right away and take her into custody!
You do not have to use violence on her!
This town's system itself has decided that she is a threat!
So you would shoot a victim who has not even committed a crime yet?!
Target's Threat Judgement has been updated.
Aim carefully and eliminate the target.
Or... this gun will kill you.
Target's Threat Judgement has been updated.
Aim calmly and bring the target under control.
I will expect you to thoroughly explain your handling of this situation in your report.
This newbie we got sure is a piece of work.
This is a world where the mental state and personal tendencies of humans can be quantified.
While all sorts of inclinations are recorded and policed, these measured numbers used to judge people's souls are commonly called Psycho-Pass.
This is a world where the mental state and personal tendencies of humans can be quantified.
While all sorts of inclinations are recorded and policed, these measured numbers used to judge people's souls are commonly called Psycho-Pass.
This story is a work of fiction.
The names of all individuals and organizations that appear in this show are fictitious and any similarity to those in existence in the real world is purely coincidental.
